item.title: Rare earth miners jump as Trump is eyeing mineral stockpile to reduce China dependence
item.description: Trump's move is aimed at cutting America's dependence on China for materials essential to electric vehicles, defense systems and advanced technology.

item.title: Strategy slides after bitcoin briefly dips below crypto firm's key breakeven level
item.description: Bitcoin fell as low as about $74,500 early Monday, dipping below Strategy's average purchase price of $76,052 per token.
